MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Whitley Avenue, Emmett Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.39AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further resources required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.54PM on 14th January 2021.
